products.name: Foaming Facial Cleanser
products.description: A gentle foaming cleanser that removes excess oil without disrupting the skin barrier.
products.allIngredients: Aqua / Water, Glycerin, Cocamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine, Niacinamide, Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate, PEG-150 Pentaerythrityl Tetrastearate, Ceramide NP, Ceramide AP, Ceramide EOP, Carbomer, Sodium Chloride, Cholesterol, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Benzoate, Disodium EDTA, Phytosphingosine

products.name: Hydrating Facial Cleanser
products.description: A non-foaming cleanser that gently cleanses while maintaining moisture.
products.allIngredients: Aqua / Water, Glycerin, Cetearyl Alcohol, PEG-40 Stearate, Stearyl Alcohol, Cetyl Alcohol, Phenoxyethanol, Polysorbate 20, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Carbomer, Ceramide NP, Ceramide AP, Ceramide EOP, Cholesterol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Disodium EDTA, Phytosphingosine

products.name: Toleriane Purifying Foaming Cleanser
products.description: A gentle foaming cleanser that removes impurities while respecting sensitive skin.
products.allIngredients: Aqua / Water, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, PEG-8, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Niacinamide, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Hydroxide, Ceramide NP, PEG-100 Stearate, Disodium EDTA

products.name: Toleriane Hydrating Gentle Cleanser
products.description: A creamy cleanser that gently removes impurities without drying the skin.
products.allIngredients: Aqua / Water, Glycerin, Propanediol, Sodium Cocoyl Glycinate, PEG-120 Methyl Glucose Dioleate, Niacinamide, Ceramide NP, Sodium Chloride, Caprylyl Glycol

products.name: Gentle Skin Cleanser
products.description: A mild cleanser designed to cleanse sensitive skin without irritation.
products.allIngredients: Water, Glycerin, Cetyl Alcohol, Propylene Glycol, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Stearyl Alcohol, Panthenol, Niacinamide, Tocopherol

products.name: Daily Facial Cleanser
products.description: A refreshing daily cleanser that removes dirt and oil effectively.
products.allIngredients: Water, Glycerin, Coco-Glucoside, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Chloride, Citric Acid

products.name: Ultra Gentle Hydrating Cleanser
products.description: A gentle cleanser formulated to cleanse without stripping moisture.
products.allIngredients: Water, Glycerin, Coco-Glucoside, Sodium Cocoyl Glycinate, Panthenol, Sodium Chloride, Citric Acid

products.name: Low pH Good Morning Gel Cleanser
products.description: A low-pH gel cleanser that refreshes skin and supports clearer pores, ideal for oily and combination skin.

products.name: Salicylic Acid Cleanser
products.description: A cleanser designed to help unclog pores and reduce breakouts.
products.allIngredients: Water, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Salicylic Acid, Zinc PCA, Glycerin

products.name: Oat Cleansing Balm
products.description: A gentle balm cleanser that removes makeup while soothing the skin.
products.allIngredients: Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Avena Sativa Kernel Oil, Avena Sativa Kernel Flour, Polysorbate 85

products.name: Cleanance Cleansing Gel
products.description: A purifying cleanser that helps reduce excess oil.

products.name: Sensibio H2O Micellar Water
products.description: A micellar water that cleanses and removes makeup without irritation.

products.name: Soy Face Cleanser
products.description: A gentle gel cleanser that cleanses while maintaining skin balance.
products.allIngredients: Water, Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Coco-Glucoside, Glycine Soja Protein, Citric Acid

products.name: Blueberry Bounce Gentle Cleanser
products.description: A gentle cleanser enriched with antioxidants to refresh the skin.
